## SubscribeFactory type

ServiceDefinition for the subscribe primitive. This is what gets composed into a service context.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type SubscribeFactory = ServiceDefinition<'subscribe', SubscribeFunction>;
```
**References:** [ServiceDefinition](../../lattice/servicedefinition/)<!-- -->, [SubscribeFunction](../subscribefunction/)
